title: Provides additional STAR2 tax rebate to those owners of parcels of land who are eligible for the school tax relief (STAR) exemption
summary: Provides additional STAR2 tax rebate in the amount equal to ten percent of the school tax paid to those owners of parcels of land who are eligible for the school tax relief (STAR) exemption; grants statutory authority and administrative evidence to the commissioner of taxation and finance.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law and the tax law, in relation to establishing the STAR2 tax rebate program
